articles.title: Mobile tickets introduced at Elland Road - Leeds United
articles.description: Fans to receive mobile tickets on their smartphones for 2022/23 season.
articles.content: Leeds United are pleased to announce that the comprehensive upgrade of the new ticketing system is complete and all 92 turnstiles have now been upgraded to facilitate mobile ticket entry into Elland … [+1755 chars]

articles.author: Chay Quinn
articles.title: Stars fail to draw the crowds at Wimbledon: Seats are left empty on Centre Court - Daily Mail
articles.description: Just over 36,600 people poured in to the All England Club in SW19 to watch sports stars including Andy Murray and Emma Raducanu on Centre Court on Day 3.
articles.content:
Queues have returned to Wimbledon for the first time since before the pandemic - but tournament bosses have seen lower attendance than expected.

articles.author: Harriet Johnston
articles.title: Merrily, merrily! Rowing fans don elegant dresses for second day of posh Henley Royal Regatta - Daily Mail
articles.description: Many of the ladies arriving on the Oxfordshire town's riverbanks in the sunshine donned their finery for the event wearing vibrant dresses for the high society day out.
articles.content:
Rowing fans donned skimpy slip dresses and trendy form-fitting jumpsuits as they attended the second day of the Henley Royal Regatta in Oxfordshire this morning.

articles.author: Kate Dennett
articles.title: Caitlyn Jenner sparks debate over ban on transgender female athletes in swimming - Daily Mail
articles.description: The TV personality, 72, has previously spoken out in support of a governing body FINA's new policy that bans transgender women from competing in swimming races.
articles.content:
Caitlyn Jenner sparked a heated debate on Good Morning Britain as she discussed the swimming governing body's ban on transgender female athletes.
